title: MC_GroupEnable (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_GroupEnable
This function block changes the state for a group from
GroupDisabled
to
GroupStandby
.
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.
Note
The command does not influence the power state of any of the
single axes in the group
The configuration of the axes (e.g. the dynamic limits) is read on
enabling.  If the configuration of an axis of the group is changed,
these changes are only taken into account if the axis group is disabled
and enabled again.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Start the change of state at the rising edge

rows:
Deprecated, no longer used.  This input will be removed in future
versions.
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
